scriptmanager.charts

Class CompositePlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.charts.CompositePlot

  • public class CompositePlot
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of static methods for plotting lines of sense & antisense or combined composite plots with customizable titles, colors, and legends.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    DNAShapefromBED, DNAShapefromFASTA, TagPileupOutput

    • Method Detail

      • createCompositePlot

        public static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel createCompositePlot(double[] x,
                                                             double[] y1,
                                                             double[] y2,
                                                             java.lang.String name,
                                                             java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> COLORS)
        Create a two-line plot (sense and antisense composites) with a title and custom colors. There are no checks on input array lengths (line plot determined by length of domain array).
        Parameters:
        x - the domain values array
        y1 - "Sense Strand" values array
        y2 - "Anti Strand" values array
        name - title of the plot
        COLORS - a 2-element array of colors of the sense and antisense lines (first color = sense, second color = anti)
        Returns:
        the line plot for display

      • createCompositePlot

        public static java.awt.Component createCompositePlot(double[] x,
                                                     double[] y1,
                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> COLORS)
        Create a one-line plot (combined composites) with a title and custom color. There are no checks on input array lengths (line plot determined by length of domain array).
        Parameters:
        x - the domain values array
        y1 - "Combined" values array
        name - title of the plot
        COLORS - a 1-element array of colors of the sense and antisense lines (first color = sense, second color = anti)
        Returns:
        the line plot for display

      • createCompositePlot

        public static java.awt.Component createCompositePlot(double[] x,
                                                     double[] y1,
                                                     java.lang.String name)
        Create a one-line plot (combined composites) with a title using a black line. There are no checks on input array lengths (line plot determined by length of domain array).
        Parameters:
        x - the domain values array
        y1 - "Combined" values array
        name - title of the plot
        Returns:
        the line plot for display

      • createChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart(org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset dataset,
                                                     java.lang.String TITLE,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> COLORS)
        Create line chart with a legend
        Parameters:
        dataset - the (x,y) values (agnostic to number of series)
        TITLE - title of the plot
        COLORS - colors to use for each data series (depends on dataset)
        Returns:
        the line plot

      • createChart

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createChart(org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset dataset,
                                                     java.lang.String TITLE,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> COLORS,
                                                     boolean legend)
        Create line chart with an optional legend
        Parameters:
        dataset - the (x,y) values (agnostic to number of series)
        TITLE - title of the plot
        COLORS - colors to use for each dataseries (depends on dataset)
        legend - to print legend describing series
        Returns:
        the line plot
